snippet: The Supreme Court’s order indicated that Arizona must issue licenses to young immigrants spared from deportation by President Obama.
abstract: Supreme Court issues allows ruling requiring Arizona to issue driver's licenses to young unauthorized immigrants who have been spared from deportation by Pres Obama.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court’s order indicated that Arizona must issue licenses to young immigrants spared from deportation by President Obama.

headline.main: Justices Support Licenses for Immigrants in Arizona
headline.print_headline: Justices Support Licenses for Immigrants in Arizona
